text: Happy birthday, Remington! Kelly Clarkson's little boy turned 1 on Wednesday, and the singer couldn't help but celebrate with adorable pics on Instagram. WATCH : Kelly Clarkson Can't Stop Laughing When Her Voice Cracks In the Studio :'What the Hell Was That'The mother of two ( and stepmother to husband Brandon Blackstock's two children from a previous relationship ) went all out for her family's celebration, dressing Remy in an adorable crown and bowtie. ` ` Happy 1st Birthday to our sweet little boy!! # RemyB # BlackstockCampgrounds # ILoveHim,'' Clarkson captioned a collage of photos from the big day. Happy 1st Birthday to our sweet little boy!! # Remy
